mapper.insert: insert into cidev_project (project_id, project_name, project_type, description, owner_id, created_at) values(#{projectId}, #{projectName}, #{projectType}, #{description}, #{ownerId}, now())

insert into cibase_files(file_id, file_name, file_path, file_size, file_suffix, file_content_type, file_url, created_by, created_at) values(#{fileId}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileSuffix}, #{fileContentType}, #{fileUrl}, #{createdBy}, now())
insert into cidev_base_files_assoc(file_assoc_id, version_id, file_id, file_type, file_seq) values(#{fileAssocId}, #{versionId}, #{fileId}, #{fileType}, #{fileSeq})
